title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Answers do not need to be simplified. Trigonometric function values do not need to be evaluated. The third point requires presentation of a vector.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
The second point may be earned for numerical or symbolic evidence of correct antidifferentiation.

The third point requires use of the initial condition.

Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
The first point requires evidence of the derivative being used.

The second point requires a statement that the derivative changes sign at the indicated value of t. title: Part D
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include a correct equation.
The student response accurately includes a correct equation.
